page.title: 02A Day in the Life of Jennie
page.content: This morning I got up at 7.45 and went back to sleep till 8 0' clock.I got dressed and went downstairs for breakfast-I had cornflakes.I went to get all my school belongings ready and set off for school at about 8.40,arriving at 8.50.We waited for the whistle to go and then lined up at 8.55.In the cloakroom I took my coat off and went down to assembly.In assembly we talked about teams,this lasted for half an hour.Afterwards I went back to class and did some maths for about twenty minutes.The fourth years went to another teacher because the third years in our class go swimming.At 12 o'clock I had lunch.I have a packed lunch but some children have school lunches.Afterwards the whole class went onto the field to play rounders.This is a game where you have a bat and a ball and two teams.
